main.description:
Seamless, inspiring and meaningful


Gone are the days when meetings were confined to rigid boardrooms and stiff, suit-and-tie venues. Now, a whole world of inspiration can arise beyond the four walls of a boardroom. With the right setting you can turn routine discussions into meaningful connections.

Ink an important contract or seal the deal in an environment that does the job right. Have a look at our extensive portfolio of meeting spaces for a productive and memorable exchange of ideas.

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
Reimagine your corporate meetings at Discovery Samal's captivating tropical landscape, a mere 5-minute boat ride from Davao City proper.  The resort boasts private function rooms equipped with state-of-the-art-technology, ensuring seamless connectivity and a productive environment for all your corporate events.

Discovery Samal also offers a variety of delectable dining options, perfect for powering up your team during cruicial meetings and enhancing overall productivity. Our dedicated Meeting Specialists are ready to assist you with the planning of your customized event that's perfectly tailored to meet your specific needs. 

 

Most popular facilities:

  • Whole day and half day packages inclusive of set or buffet lunch
  • Flexible function and meeting spaces
  • High-speed internet access
  • Audiovisual equipment
  • Meeting and conference accessories
  • 1,000 capacity Samal Grand Ballroom

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description:
Nestled in the vibrant Makati business district, Discovery Primea offers easy access to both local and international business travelers alike. Designed to elevate your business engagements to new heights, our team is committed to providing a seamless service for you, setting the stage for productivity and collaboration.

Meeting rooms at Discovery Primea feature premium amenities, including boardroom tables with media panels, meant for a conducive working environment. The exclusive number of meeting venues assures personalized and bespoke attention for every group. You can focus on the business at hand with a dedicated concierge and IT butlers who will cater to every whim.

 

Most popular facilities:

  • Full-day and half-day packages with a choice of set or buffet lunch
  • Versatile function and meeting spaces
  • High-speed internet connectivity
  • State-of-the-art audiovisual equipment
  • Meeting and conference amenities

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description:
It’s all about the execution. The ideal environment can elevate your experience. Our meeting rooms are not just spaces; they are fully equipped with facilities that seamlessly blend convenience with productivity. Sweeping views of the city skyline will give your average business meeting an extraordinary touch at Discovery Suites. 

Allow our team of professionals to curate a personalized and unforgettable experience tailored to your needs and preferences.

 

Most popular facilities:

  • Whole day and half day packages, complemented by a set or buffet lunch
  • Adaptable function and meeting venues
  • High-speed internet access
  • Audiovisual equipment
  • Meeting and conference essentials

main.description:
Sophisticated. Stylish. Seamless.

Exchange your wedding vows with a flair of metropolitan charm in some of the most iconic cities in the Philippines. Experience the magic of urban weddings, where you make every moment a picturesque celebration in seamless sophistication.

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
"Every photographer's dream. With this natural ambience, it is truly one of the most romantic places to tie the knot." - SunStar

A unique wedding destination that effortlessly blends natural beauty with a flair of urban sophistication. Nestled amidst lush greenery and pristine beaches and located just a 5-minute boat ride from Davao City, Discovery Samal offers an idyllic setting for your special day. This tropical paradise in the heart of The Island Garden City of Samal sets the mood for an intimate and romantic atmosphere. 

Choose between a dreamy beach wedding or an intimate exchange of vows at the Divine Grace Chapel, located at the topmost part of the resort. For large gatherings, spacious function rooms and the 1,000 capacity Samal Grand Ballroom provide the perfect venue to accommodate all your cherished guests. 

Make every detail a lasting impression with a wedding celebration that is as extraordinary as your love story.

 

Unmatched Offerings:

  • Tailored wedding packages
  • Ideal for intimate and large gatherings
  • Spacious banquet and function rooms
  • Complimentary photoshoot
  • Honeymoon suite exclusive for the couple
  • Curated culinary delights
  • Congratulatory gift

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description:
"Sleek, stylish and sophisticated, with breathtaking views of the city that truly make for a picturesque venue." - Bride and Breakfast

Your special day deserves nothing less than the epitome of elegance and sophistication. Go for an ultra-luxe wedding celebration in the heart of the Makati district for a sensational milestone you'll cherish for a lifetime.

Discovery Primea offers highly personalized service, exquisite design, state-of-the-art facilities, and gourmet culinary specialties. Discerning couples will find every detail meticulously crafted to perfection.

 

Unmatched Offerings:

  • Bespoke wedding packages
  • Best venue for intimate gatherings
  • Sophisticated banquet and function rooms
  • Complimentary photoshoot
  • Romantic honeymoon suite for the newlyweds
  • Curated dining experiences
  • Congratulatory gift

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description:
"Ring in your nuptials with an elegant yet affordable celebration." - Preview

Where every aspect of your stay is designed to make your special day extra memorable. Revel at the panoramic view of the metro, right at the center of the Ortigas Business District. 

More than the breathtaking views at the top, Discovery Suites offers a personalized, seamless experience that is designed to bring you comfort and convenience as you take your steps towards 'I do'. 

 

Unmatched Offerings:

  • Personalized wedding packages
  • Perfect for intimate celebrations
  • Elegant banquet and function rooms
  • Complimentary photoshoot
  • Exclusive honeymoon suite for the newlyweds
  • Expertly crafted culinary experiences
  • Congratulatory gift

main.description:
Serene. Intimate. Breathtaking.

Celebrate your love amidst stunning nature landscapes in the most iconic Philippine locations and create everlasting memories with a destination wedding tailored just for you.

venues.title: Discovery Boracay
venues.description: Celebrate in style at Discovery Boracay. We make your dream wedding come true with the award island's renowned beachfront glamour as your canvas while you exchange vows in our intimate spaces, providing modern convenience and luxury within reach.

venues.title: Discovery Coron
venues.description:
Tie the knot on a secluded island all to your own, as Coronâ€™s cerulean waters and pristine white sand make for a picture-perfect backdrop. 

Couples looking for exclusivity and intimacy will love the hidden beaches and precious spots around the island.

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
An ideal wedding destination in the Island Garden City of Samal for couples seeking to enjoy intimacy, privacy, and romance. Discovery Samal offers you the option to exchange your much-awaited vows by the coast with a majestic view of the calm seas as your witness or embrace the solemnity of the occasion at the quaint very own Divine Grace Chapel, sitting at the resort's highest point. Specialized services for Muslim, Indian, Christian, and Catholic weddings are available. 

The tropical resort also houses the largest convention center in Davao with a capacity for 1,200 guests, making it an ideal place to host your festivities with large crowds.

venues.title: Manami Resort
venues.description:
Amidst the elaborate flora and ravishing fauna, Manami Resort is a dreamy wedding destination in Sipalay. Through the green groves, pristine shorelines, and serene cosmos of the ocean, the absolute aura of this distinct haven sets the magic in intimate celebrations. Let nature be a part of the beginning of a new journey of life as vows are expressed and deep affections are celebrated. 

Take in captivating moments through the romantic open footprints that nurture new stories. Every interaction is heightened and brought to refined meaning.

main.description:
Stunning. Outstanding. Awe-inspiring.

Dream it, and we’ll make it happen: social gatherings are our specialty. 

Let your imagination run free while we do the essentials. With a commitment to exceptional service, diverse culinary offerings, and thoughtfully designed spaces, we transform your vision into a reality. Celebrate your way—we'll take care of the rest.

venues.title: Discovery Boracay
venues.description:
Picture this: this is a celebration you've waited for so long and it's finally happening. Set against an all-natural backdrop, surrounded by the crystal clear turqoise waters and the soothing sounds of the waves. Moments of pure bliss awaits, where gleeful cheers echo as you share a toast under the warm glow of the sun.

Whether you're planning a destination wedding, a corporate gathering, or an intimate rendezvous, the natural beauty of Boracay Island will infuse every moment with its irresistible charm. From a boodle fight feast to a romantic starlit dinner arrangement, we're happy to custom-tailor your special occassion to your preferences.

Our talented culinary team is here to bring an exciting gourmet edge to your event with creative menus inspired by coastal cuisine.

 

What We Offer:

  • Customized event packages
  • Ideal for intimate gatherings
  • Spacious banquet and function rooms
  • Curated culinary delights

venues.title: Discovery Coron
venues.description:
Whether you're celebrating a birthday, wedding, an anniversary milestone, or company outing, our team can curate a personalized and intimate celebration that's tailor-fit for your needs. We are here to ensure that the most special day of your life is nothing short of spectacular.

Enjoy the exclusivity of an island sanctuary, featuring hidden beaches, secret picnic spots, and secluded neighboring islands. Discovery Coron boasts of breathtaking white sand beaches, an abundance of floral and fauna, and exhilarating dive sites that promise to make your next social affair a colorful and unforgettable experience. 

Savor the best of both worlds with the option to enjoy indoor and outdoor activities alike. Go for a quiet nature walk through a lush tropical landscapes or dive into the pristine azure shores of the private island's in-house reef, where a vibrant marine life awaits to stun you. 

 

What We Offer:

  • Bespoke event packages
  • Perfect for intimate and large gatherings
  • Expansive banquet and function rooms
  • Tailored dining experiences

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
Housing the largest grand ballroom in Davao, Discovery Samal makes an ideal location for your next social festivities. From large social gatherings to an intimate dinner celebration with your loved ones, you can transform our multiple event spaces into the vision you desire. Choose between our bespoke indoor spaces where you can showcase a chic, stylish celebration and picturesque outdoor settings; throw a barefoot beach party celebration by the fine white sandy shores, or showcase a chic, stylish celebration in our expansive and versatile function rooms. 

Surrounded by the pristine beachfront and framed by stunning sunsets with the occassional apperance of Mt. Apo, your event will be immersed in natural splendor. Our Event Specialists' genuine care and attention detail guarantee that your celebration is seamlessly executed. With personalized services and outstanding facilities,  you're off to set the trend for a unique tropical island social gathering.

 

What We Offer:

  • Tailor-made event packages
  • Best for close-knit gatherings and lavish affairs
  • Sweeping banquet and conference spaces
  • Tailored dining experiences
  • 1,000 capacity Samal Grand Ballroom

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description:
Your next social gathering in the city is full of infinite possibilities. From formal business functions to a festive-filled social events, ranging from birthdays to anniversary milestones, our versatile fuction rooms and exceptional services ensures every detail aligns to how you envisioned it. 

Toast to a memorable bash while admiring the expansive skyline view of the Ortigas Business District. With our committment to quality and excellence, our highly trained team creative event specialists are here to take care of the details so you can sit back, relax, and focus on enjoying the moment. 

 

What We Offer:

  • Airport transfer 
  • 24-hour check-in
  • High-speed internet access for multiple devices
  • Social and corporate event spaces
  • Projector and sound system
  • Morning and afternoon snacks
  • Set or buffet lunch
  • Free-flowing coffee or tea
  • Meeting amenities and accessories
  • Private dining arrangements

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description:
From deluxe staycations to intimate reunions to grand events, Discovery Primea can cater for all occasions. Our seasoned culinary team makes it their mission to delight you with an exquisite selection of bespoke menus, immaculately presented dishes, and mouth-watering cuisine that will tantalize even the most discerning taste buds. 

Each of our function rooms' elegant interiors is complemented by modernized facilities, creating a marvelous atomosphere for any fete. Whether you're planning for an intimate retreat or a grand celebration in the heart of Makati City, our sophisticated spaces and personalized service ensure to create a seamless and memorable experience for you. 

At Discovery Primea, every detail is accounted for, ensuring that we make every occasion truly extraordinary.

 

What We Offer:

  • Convenient airport transfer 
  • 24-hour check-in service
  • High-speed internet connectivity for multiple devices
  • Versatile spaces for social and corporate events
  • Projector and sound system
  • Morning and afternoon snacks
  • Choice of set or buffet lunch
  • Free-flowing coffee or tea
  • Meeting essentials and accessories
  • Exclusive dining options

venues.title: Manami Resort
venues.description:
Where nature's charming elegance blends seamlessly with the warmth of the local hospitality of Sipalay, Negros Occidental. At Manami Resort, we believe each milestone, big or small, is worth gathering for. Immerse yourself in meaningful moments, complemented by an exceptional spread of Negrense culinary treasures.

Our thoughtfully curated spaces are designed to accommodate your next social affair, ensuring a setting that is both picturesque and warmly inviting. You can rely on our dedication to make your celebrations one for the books—an unforgettable moment you'll reminisce fondly.

 

What We Offer:

  • Seamless airport transfer 
  • 24-hour check-in
  • High-speed Wi-Fi for multiple devices
  • Flexible venues for social and corporate events
  • Advanced projector and sound system
  • Morning and afternoon snacks
  • Set or buffet lunch options
  • Free-flowing coffee or tea
  • Meeting amenities and essentials
  • Private dining experiences

main.description:
Discovery Samal, the newest convention center in Davao, features one of the largest resort convention center in Mindanao. The Samal Grand Ballroom, a state-of-the-art events venue, can conveniently host up to 1,000 guests and is best suited for weddings, birthdays, debuts, and social gatherings of any scale, including corporate events from galas to multi-day conferences.

Located less than five minutes from Davao City, this luxury resort offers stunning views of the Davao Gulf and the renowned Discovery brand of service, making it a prime choice for hosting events in Davao. Guests can enjoy luxurious accommodations, diverse dining options, and a range of amenities. The beautiful setting and refined comfort enhance the overall experience for all attendees.

Allow us to collaborate with you in crafting the event precisely to your preferences. Get in touch with our event planning team to start planning your perfect event.
